name: @imcat-ckim/catui-mobile
description: Mobile-first, touch-optimized UI framework based on IMCAT UI core with gesture support and mobile-native components

scripts.build: set NODE_ENV=production && rollup -c && npm run build:css && npm run copy:fonts
scripts.copy:fonts: xcopy src\fonts\*.woff2 dist\fonts\ /Y /I 2>nul || mkdir dist\fonts && copy src\fonts\*.woff2 dist\fonts\
scripts.build:css: sass src/styles/catui-mobile.scss dist/catui-mobile.css --style compressed --no-source-map && npm run build:css:modules
scripts.build:css:modules: sass src/modules/overlays/overlays.scss dist/modules/overlays/overlays.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/navigation/navigation.scss dist/modules/navigation/navigation.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/pickers/pickers.scss dist/modules/pickers/pickers.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/selectors/selectors.scss dist/modules/selectors/selectors.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/forms/forms.scss dist/modules/forms/forms.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/feedback/feedback.scss dist/modules/feedback/feedback.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/carousel/carousel.scss dist/modules/carousel/carousel.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/pagination/pagination.scss dist/modules/pagination/pagination.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/scroll/scroll.scss dist/modules/scroll/scroll.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/social/social.scss dist/modules/social/social.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/wordcloud/wordcloud.scss dist/modules/wordcloud/wordcloud.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/list/list.scss dist/modules/list/list.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/auth/auth.scss dist/modules/auth/auth.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/search/search.scss dist/modules/search/search.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/media/media.scss dist/modules/media/media.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/onboarding/onboarding.scss dist/modules/onboarding/onboarding.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass src/modules/payment/payment.scss dist/modules/payment/payment.css --style
